titles.title: A bill to amend the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for implementation of the development plan for Pennsylvania Avenue between the Capitol and the White House, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment. With written report No. 100-462.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 878.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 4754 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 8/9/1988--Indefinitely postponed in Senate. (Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate (See H.R. 4754 as passed Senate for similar provisions)) Amends the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for operating and administrative expenses for FY 1989 through 1992.
